title: Language Model Metadata
description: A language model metadata defintion for developer tools

model_id.description: The identifier of the model (example: gpt-3.5-turbo)

model_name.description: The human-friendly name of the model (example: GPT-3.5 Turbo)

model_provider.description: The provider of the model in lowercase (example: openai)

model_description.description: A human-friendly description of the model

model_info.description: Link to a page with more information about the model

context_window.description: The maximum number of tokens in the model's context window

max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens the model will use to generate a response

cost_per_token.description: The cost per token in USD

input.description: The cost per token of input send to the model

output.description: The cost per token of output generated by the model

knowledge_cutoff.description: The training data cutoff date for the model

token_encoding.description: What encoding the model uses for tokens (example: cl100k_base)

tuning.description: Tags for things the model was tuned for (example: function, instruction)
